Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 69th/Hamilton
ShortDescription: Eastbound 67 67th-69th-71st  buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, 67th, Damen and 69th: due to, street blockage near 69th/Hamilton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #67 67th-69th-71st  buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, 67th, Damen and 69th: due to, street blockage near 69th/Hamilton.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at Clark/Roscoe-Addison
ShortDescription: #22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark,  Addison, Racine, Belmont, due to street blockage near Clark/Roscoe-Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark,  Addison, Racine, Belmont, then resume their normal route on Clark, due to street blockage near Clark/Roscoe-Addison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary #20 Madison Reroute near Madison/Western
ShortDescription: 20 Madison buses temp. rerouted near Madison/Western.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near Madison/Western.

Westbound buses will operate via Madison, Oakley, Washington, Western, Madison, and resume normal route.

Eastbound buses will operate via Madison, Western, Warren, Oakley, Madison, and then resume their normal route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary #57 Laramie Reroute at Chicago/Lamon-Central
ShortDescription: 57 Laramie buses are temporarily rerouted near Chicago/Lamon-Central.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#57 Laramie buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Laramie, Division, Austin, Washington, Laramie, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near Chicago/Lamon-Central.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary #66 Chicago Reroute at Chicago/Lamon-Central.
ShortDescription: 66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted near Chicago/Lamon-Central.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Chicago, Cicero, Division, Austin into the terminal, and resume normal route,  due to street blockage near Chicago/Lamon-Central.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at UIC Halsted
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing with significant delays at UIC Halsted. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing with significant delays at UIC Halsted due to a sick customer.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
